main_definition: Another refers to an additional or different thing, person, or instance similar to a previously mentioned one.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A different individual from the same group or category as another specified entity.
meanings_and_examples.example: After interviewing two candidates for the job position, I'll need to talk with another applicant.

meanings_and_examples.definition: One more of a similar kind.
meanings_and_examples.example: I have read five novels this month; can I borrow your book? Another one would be great!

meanings_and_examples.definition: Another set or collection that is distinct but related to the first mentioned item.
meanings_and_examples.example: We received another batch of shipments with various products.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An additional option or alternative choice available.
meanings_and_examples.example: Do you have any other recommendations for a good restaurant in town?

meanings_and_examples.definition: Something more than what has been previously discussed or presented.
meanings_and_examples.example: We covered the basics of budgeting; another aspect we should consider is tax planning.
